law.catch_line: Master licensed diabetes educator -- Administrative regulations.

text.section:
An applicant for licensure as a master licensed diabetes educator shall:
File a written application on forms provided by the board; and
Provide proof of completion of the credentialing program of the American Association of Diabetes Educators or the National Certification Board for Diabetes Educators as a certified advanced diabetes manager or a certified diabetes educator.

The board shall promulgate administrative regulations to do the following, including but not limited to:
Establish a fee for licensure; and
Establish additional requirements for a master licensed diabetes educator as the board determines are necessary.

law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2013.
